about_the_game:
Resonance Solstice is a unique train simulation adventure RPG that combines real-time card battles with business simulation. Players take on the role of a train conductor onboard the train rented from COLUMBA and run through the continent to reconnect cities and regions to save the world on the brink of crisis.

Dear Conductor, finally we meet!

Board the Eternal and embark on your boundless journey!

「Drive the Eternal at full speed」

Drive the Eternal across " Morphic Field Pollution" zones and travel through the beautiful post-catastrophe landscapes. Start the engine and reconnect the world rendered in shambles.

「Moveable Home Onboard; Decoration on Every Corner!」

Decorate and create your mobile home, the Eternal. Various activities and exciting gameplay await discovery.

「Real-time card battles with endless combinations」

Real-time card battles with flexible team-building options allow for countless deep combinations to create your exclusive build.

「Journey Across Continent; Fight with Train Crew」

With exquisite illustrations crafted by popular anime artists and stylish character designs, all characters feature Live2D animation.

Meet new companions and fight side by side!

◆Game Overview

Resonance Solstice is an RPG that focuses on real-time card battles and train management gameplay. Players take on the role of a conductor under the Columba, driving their train across the rail loop between Bonfire City and delivering supplies to different regions. In this world full of unknowns, you'll meet companions with diverse factions, personalities, identities, and abilities, and together you'll face the adventures and challenges that come your way during your journey.

◆World Settings

When the unknown object "Selene β" appeared in the sky, everything we once knew changed. The world was thrown into disarray, with conflicting factions and chaos spreading through every corner of the cities. Humanity fell into a deep sleep, transformed into non-human beings trapped in dreams. In this rebuilt world, as a conductor of the Columba, you will drive the train that connects the bonfire cities of hope. Where will your journey take you?

◆GAMEDUCHY is a passionate group of young developers. Since the establishment of the studio, we have been committed to one

goal: to create a game that is recognized and appreciated by players. With renowned artists, a dream team of voice actors, experienced game producers, and world-class musicians as part of our production team, we always view our work from the player's perspective, striving to deliver the best gaming experience to all who support and anticipate our game.
